cast.overview: During WWII, a teenage boy discovering himself becomes love-stricken by Malèna, a sensual woman living in a small, narrow-minded Italian town.
cast.title: Malena

details.biography: Marcello Catalano Malcoun is a professional singer, actor and stuntman. His new album is out now. His band's name is "8-is" and the album's title is "Frame of us". Marcello is since 2003 pro fitness and bodybuildig trainer F.I.F. Italian Federation Fitness. Vocal coach since 2004. Horseman since 1978. Sword Master Tito Tomassni's student fencing. Claudio Pacifico stunt coordinator's student.
details.name: Marcello Catalano
